description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin, Zucchini & Sage Macaroni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pumpkin, Zucchini & Sage Macaroni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat soup in a large frying pan over high heat. Add macaroni, 3/4 cup parmesan and sage to soup. Reserve some of the zucchini for serving and stir remainder through macaroni mixture. Transfer to a baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with reserved zucchini, extra sage leaves and remaining parmesan.

Transfer to a baking dish. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Serve topped with reserved zucchini, extra sage leaves and remaining parmesan.
